いつまでも: forever,for good,eternally,as long as one likes,indefinitely
しまう: to finish,to close,to do something completely
そっくり: all,altogether,entirely,be just like,the splitting image of
そのうち: eventually,sooner or later,of the previously mentioned
ちょうだい: (1) please do for me (preceded by -te),(2) reception,being given,get
できる: to be able to,to be ready,to occur
では: chance of going out,opportunity (to succeed),moment of departure,beginning of work
ところで: by the way,even if,no matter what
とにかく: anyhow,at any rate,anyway,somehow or other,generally speaking,in any case
とんでもない: unexpected,offensive,What a thing to say!,No way!
どうしても: by all means,at any cost,no matter what
どれ: well,now,let me see,which (of three or more)
やはり: also,as I thought,still,in spite of,absolutely,of course
コピー: (1) a (photo)copy,(2) blurb on a book jacket
サービス: (1) service,support system,(2) goods or services without charge
一人一人: one by one,each,one at a time
一体: (1) one object,one body,(2) what on earth?,really?,(3) generally
一方: (1) on the other hand,(2) meanwhile,(3) only,simple,in turn
万一: by some chance,by some possibility,if by any chance,10E4:1 odds
乗せる: to place on (something),to take on board,to give a ride
任せる: to entrust to another,to leave to
伸ばす: to lengthen,to stretch,to reach out,to grow (beard)
伸びる: to stretch,to extend,to make progress,to grow (beard, body height)
似合う: to suit,to match,to become,to be like
倒す: to throw down,to beat,to bring down,to blow down
備える: to furnish,to provide for,to equip,to install
先ず: first (of all),to start with,about,almost,hardly (with neg. verb)
先日: the other day,a few days ago
全然: (1) wholly,entirely,completely,(2) not at all (with neg. verb)
凍る: to freeze,to be frozen over,to congeal
出会う: to meet by chance,to come across,to happen to encounter
切れる: (1) to cut well,to be sharp,(2) to break (off)
加わる: to join in,to accede to,to increase,to gain in (influence)
劣る: to fall behind,to be inferior to
占める: (1) to comprise,to account for,to make up (of),(2) to hold,to occupy
収める: to obtain,to reap,to pay,to supply,to accept
取り上げる: to take up,to pick up,to disqualify,to confiscate,to deprive
取れる: to come off,to be taken off,to be removed
合わせる: to join together,to be opposite,to face,to unite
吐く: (1) to breathe,(2) to tell (lies),(3) to vomit,to disgorge
吠える: to bark,to bay,to howl,to bellow,to roar,to cry
含む: to hold in the mouth,to bear in mind
基づく: to be grounded on,to be based on,to be due to,to originate from
学ぶ: to study (in depth),to learn,to take lessons in
守る: to protect,to obey,to guard,to abide (by the rules)
実は: as a matter of fact,by the way
対象: target,object (of worship, study, etc),subject (of taxation, etc)
就く: to settle in (place),to take (seat, position),to study (under teacher)
広がる: to spread (out),to extend,to stretch,to reach to,to get around
引っ張る: (1) to pull,to draw,to stretch,to drag,(2) to pull the ball (baseball)
当たる: to be hit,to be successful,to be equivalent to
従う: to abide (by the rules),to obey,to follow,to accompany
応じる: to respond,to satisfy,to accept,to comply with,to apply for
悲しむ: to be sad,to mourn for,to regret
抜く: to extract,to omit,to surpass,to draw out,to unplug
抜ける: to come out,to fall out,to be omitted
抱える: to hold or carry under or in the arms
指す: to point,to put up umbrella,to play
振る: (1) to wave,to shake,to swing,(2) to sprinkle,(3) to cast (actor),to allocate (work)
掛かる: to take (e.g. time, money, etc),to hang
描く: to draw,to paint,to sketch,to depict,to describe
支える: to be blocked,to choke,to be obstructed
救う: to rescue from,to help out of
望む: to desire,to wish for,to see,to command (a view of)
松: (1) pine tree,(2) highest (of a three-tier ranking system)
梅雨: rainy season,rain during the rainy season
構う: to mind,to care about,to be concerned about
止す: to cease,to abolish,to resign,to give up
残す: to leave (behind, over),to bequeath,to save,to reserve
気付く: to notice,to recognize,to become aware of
求める: to seek,to request,to demand,to want,to wish for,to search for,to pursue (pleasure),to hunt (a job),
注ぐ: to pour (into),to irrigate,to pay,to fill,to feed (e.g. a fire)
流す: to drain,to float,to shed (blood, tears),to cruise (e.g. taxi)
流れる: to stream,to flow,to run (ink),to be washed away
浴びる: to bathe,to bask in the sun,to shower
減る: to decrease (in size or number),to diminish,to abate
満ちる: to be full,to rise (tide),to mature,to expire
為る: to change,to be of use,to reach to
狂う: to go mad,to get out of order
現れる: (1) to appear,to come in sight,to become visible,(2) to express oneself
生じる: to produce,to yield,to result from,to arise,to be generated
申し込む: to apply for,to make an application
疑う: to doubt,to distrust,to be suspicious of,to suspect
破る: to tear,to violate,to defeat,to smash,to destroy
示す: to denote,to show,to point out,to indicate
程度: degree,amount,grade,standard,of the order of (following a number)
空く: (1) to open,to become empty,(2) to be less crowded
精々: at the most,at best,to the utmost,as much (far) as possible
繋ぐ: to tie,to fasten,to connect,to transfer (phone call)
繰り返す: to repeat,to do something over again
育つ: to raise (child),to be brought up,to grow (up)
裏切る: to betray,to turn traitor to,to double-cross
要するに: in a word,after all,the point is ..,in short ..
覆う: to cover,to hide,to conceal,to wrap,to disguise
触れる: to touch,to be touched,to touch on a subject,to feel,to violate (law, copyright, etc.),to perceive,t
訓: native Japanese reading of a Chinese character
訴える: to sue (a person),to resort to,to appeal to
認める: to recognize,to appreciate,to approve,to admit,to notice
誘う: (1) to invite,to ask,(2) to tempt,to lure,to induce
議員: member of the Diet, congress or parliament
譲る: to turn over,to assign,to hand over
贈る: to send,to give to,to award to,to confer on
轢く: to run somebody over (with vehicle),to knock someone down
迎え: meeting,person sent to pick up an arrival
逆らう: to go against,to oppose,to disobey,to defy
通じる: to run to,to lead to,to communicate,to understand
過ごす: to pass,to spend,to go through,to tide over
避ける: (1) to avoid (physical contact ),(2) to ward off,to avert
隠れる: to hide,to be hidden,to conceal oneself,to disappear
離れる: to be separated from,to leave,to go away,to be a long way off
頂く: to receive,to take food or drink (hum)
預ける: to give into custody,to entrust,to deposit
頼る: to rely on,to have recourse to,to depend on
飛び出す: to jump out,to rush out,to fly out
飽きる: to get tired of,to lose interest in,to have enough
鬼: ogre,demon,it (i.e., in a game of tag)
